DESCRIPTION: To obtain a #yNoble #yPhantasm card, at least #b100% NP is required.
Noble Phantasm cards #yRetain and #yExhaust are played.
When you would die, heal HP instead.
At the start of turn, lose HP equal to the number of Evil Curse.
Combusted creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.
At the end of your turn, double your #yVigor.
At the start of your turn, gain #b5 #yBlock.
Additional damage taken. At the end of its turn, reduce #b1.
Prevent you would lose HP. When you Prevent, heal #b5 #yHP.
NP Damage adds additional damage to Noble Phantasm attacks.
At the end of your turn, converts your Stars to #yVigor.
Growth can prevent the next time you would lose HP equal to amount is at or below.
Whenever you play a card with Magic Bullet, lose all and deal damage to All enemies equal to #b4 times Magic Bullet.
At the end of your turn, convert to random card.
